text: Watsons at One Borneo Hypermall offers a comprehensive health and beauty shopping experience that caters to a diverse range of needs. My recent visit to this outlet left me impressed by its extensive product selection, knowledgeable staff, and convenient location within the mall.

Friendly staff and very good service
Thank u Sheila Singh who was very patient and kind in helping me chose my skin care products
Great convenience store for toiletries which comes with a pharmacy. However some toiletries are overpriced.
